titles.title: God Will Take Care Of You (familiar)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God will take care of you Thro' every day o'er all the way He will take care of you God will take care of you{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Be not dismayed whate'er betide God will take care of you Beneath His wings of love abide God will take care of you{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thro' days of toil When heart doth fail God will take care of you When dangers fierce your path assail God will take care of you{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All you may need He will provide God will take care of you Nothing you ask will be denied God will take care of you{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No matter what may be the test God will take care of you Lean weary one upon His breast God will take care of you{/lang-eng}
